episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Years after Nahla and Farah give birth at the same hospital, a devastating car accident unearths a long-buried secret.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Rashed and Farah struggle to come to terms with the revelation. Obsessed with portraying a lavish lifestyle, Amal dines out with her friends at a fancy restaurant.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While Rashed wishes to meet his biological daughter, Farah is against the idea. Later, they decide to talk it over with Mishari.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Shawq and Mishari try to obtain records of children born on the same day as Shawq. Meanwhile, Rashed gets in touch with the hospital manager to request similar documents.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Shawq makes her way to Nahla’s workplace. Majed and Rashed discuss the legal possibility of returning the girls to their biological parents.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Nahla and Rashed meet up to talk about the girls’ current situation. Amal questions her mother, whom she suspects is hiding something important from her.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Knowing Amal is spending time with Rashed, Nahla worries that she might lose her. Latifa begins spreading rumours about Rashed.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Farah tells Rashed her desire to have Amal move in with them. Jawaher tries to convince Nahla to give Amal up in exchange for money.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Rashed and Nahla agree on a date for both families to meet. Meanwhile, Farah treats Amal to lunch and some shopping.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Seeing all the expensive gifts Farah bought for Amal, Nahla loses her mind. Elsewhere, Rashed is adamant on getting a quick divorce and decides to talk to Majed about it.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A distressing call makes Jawaher worry more about her financial situation. Rajeh and Farah set out to look for Shawq, who’s gone missing.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Amal takes desperate measures to get her parents’ attention. Shawq decides to pay a surprise visit to Nahla.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: With all that’s transpired, Shawq suffers a nervous breakdown. A quarrel breaks out between Nahla and Amal.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Jawaher contacts Rajeh with an offer to exchange Amal for money. Meanwhile, Nahla finds a new job.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Farah invites Nahla and Amal over for lunch to talk about what’s best for their daughters. Rajeh asks Rashed if he can borrow some money.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Amal learns about Farah’s lunch invitation. Mishari’s run-in with the police triggers tension in the family.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: A work opportunity opens up for Nahla, giving her a chance for a new beginning, as she shares her hope of seeing Shawq from time to time with Rashed’s family.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: In a fit of anger, Rajeh accuses Nahla of trying to ruin his son’s family. The recent spate of problems intensifies the clash at Nahla’s.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A lawyer shows up demanding money from Jawaher. Nahla decides to stay at her friend’s place, while Rashed moves into a hotel.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Farah decides that Amal will live with her, as Nahla fears she might lose her daughter for good.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Rajeh plots to keep Nahla away from the family permanently, as a furious Mishari decides to confront her about tearing his family apart.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Claims about Rashed and Nahla dating spread on social media as Farah scrambles to do damage control.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Rashed and Farah lose their minds after a fed-up Shawq decides to leave home, as Nahla tries to get in touch with him.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Shawq’s plan to leave home puts Shams in a perilous situation. Mishari aims to right his wrongs, as Rajeh takes his plot against Nahla to the next level.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Rajeh meets with Nahla to discuss Amal’s situation. Later, he attempts to set a trap for Nahla.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Rajeh attempts to come clean with Rashed. Nahla visits Amal in school in hopes of mending their bond.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: After his plans hit a snag, Rajeh devises a new scheme using Jawaher. Elsewhere, Farah is adamant on keeping her marriage intact.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Shawq is disheartened after Farah prevents her from going on vacation with Nahla. Amal is introduced to her mother’s wealthy friends.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Safar tries to deflect Rashed’s accusations, as Rashed demands to know Farah’s connection to the former.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Farah confronts Safar about tarnishing Rashed’s reputation on social media. Humood goes to Amal’s school to introduce himself to her.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Humood’s persistence on taking back Amal threatens Farah and Rajeh’s plans. Elsewhere, Amal invites her friends over, stirring all kinds of trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Rajeh is furious with Amal for bringing her friends over without permission. Safar confronts Rashed about raising the company’s capital.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Nahla gets into a heated argument with Humood. Later, news of what happened to Rashed takes a toll on her.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Worried about Rashed, Nahla makes her way to the hospital. To protect his family, Rashed makes a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Rajeh tries to resolve the conflict between Mishari and Amal. Nahla faces a tough situation at work.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Rashed lets his emotions get the better of him, landing himself in a predicament, as he tries to find a solution with Farah.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: With Majed’s help, Rashed takes precautionary measures to keep himself safe from Safar, later weighing his best divorce options. Elsewhere, Amal is desperate to get her mother’s attention.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: On her birthday, Nahla receives a few gifts that surprise her. Farah makes plans to get more involved in Rashed’s company.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Nahla desperately looks for a new job and a place to stay, as Humood remains persistent on getting back with her. Elsewhere, Rashed and Farah argue over their parenting differences.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Nahla seeks legal counsel to protect herself from Humood, who storms Rashed’s hotel, prompting Rashed to increase security around the house.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Amal’s past mischief gets her into trouble. Meanwhile, Nahla tries to support Nahid with her new bakery.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Despite Nahla’s love and caring attitude, Amal insists on giving her the cold shoulder. Rashed blames Farah for Amal’s emotional insecurities.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Nahla tries to prove to Farah that Shawq needs a mother’s love, rather than luxury. Mishari accuses his mother of being too controlling.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: A desperate Farah looks for ways to have Shawq come home, as Rashed makes arrangements to move Amal to a new school.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Amal’s arrogance carries over to her new school. Nahid offers Nahla partnership in her business, as a letter intended for Shawq lands in Farah’s hands.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Nahla’s lawyer teams up with Ilaf to give Humood the edge in his legal case. Meanwhile, Farah struggles to keep Amal’s arrogance in check.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Feeling desperate, Humood turns to Jawaher to help him set a trap for Nahla, as Farah’s persistence on getting Shawq back intensifies the rivalry between him and Amal.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: Mishari’s lavish birthday party gets underway. Meanwhile, Jawaher and Humood proceed with their plan to cause Nahla trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: With Rashed’s help, Nahla tries to find out who assaulted her and the real purpose behind Jawaher’s visit.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Farah deals a devastating blow to Nahla, straining her relationship with Shawq. Elsewhere, Jawaher begs Humood to get her out of her predicament.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Hoping to ease tensions, Rashed arranges for Shawq to meet Nahla’s old friend, as Farah vows to get back at Rashed.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: Following the deadly accident, Rashed makes arrangements to keep both sisters safe. Meanwhile, investigations to apprehend the responsible driver get underway.

episodes.name: Episode 53
episodes.overview: Nahla worries about Amal’s obsession with material things. Shawq attempts to get in touch with Humood.

episodes.name: Episode 54
episodes.overview: An article about Rashed’s family goes viral, stirring up further trouble between Rashed and Farah. Elsewhere, Mishari’s friends pressure him to take part in an illegal car race.

episodes.name: Episode 55
episodes.overview: Rashed scrambles to sort out the trouble Shawq and Nahla got into. Farah faces the consequences of her decision to work for Humood and Safar.

episodes.name: Episode 56
episodes.overview: Mishari begins working at one of his father’s hotels. Farah confronts Rashed about a video she received from Humood.

episodes.name: Episode 57
episodes.overview: Unwelcome guests show up at Nahla’s café, ruining her joy. Jealous of Shawq’s success, Amal makes a risky move.

episodes.name: Episode 58
episodes.overview: Humood is accused of causing the accident at the stables, while Nahla has another suspect in mind.

episodes.name: Episode 59
episodes.overview: Farah re-evaluates her business relations with Latifa and Safar. A cautious Nahla gathers more evidence to find the real perpetrator behind the stable incident.

episodes.name: Episode 60
episodes.overview: Amal struggles with guilt as her injury worsens. Rajeh supports Farah as she stands up to Safar.

episodes.name: Episode 61
episodes.overview: A furious Farah confronts Rashed about going to the hospital without informing her. Nahla makes up her mind on marrying Rashed.

episodes.name: Episode 62
episodes.overview: Amal interrupts the wedding, losing control in an attempt to stop Rashed and Nahla from tying the knot.

episodes.name: Episode 63
episodes.overview: Farah refuses to let Ilaf explain why she was at the wedding. Meanwhile, Amal’s hostility towards everyone reaches new levels.

episodes.name: Episode 64
episodes.overview: Ilaf and Safar decide to team up. Mishari warns Amal against threatening Shawq. Rajeh tries to resolve the conflict between Farah and Ilaf.

episodes.name: Episode 65
episodes.overview: To Rashed’s chagrin, Farah appoints Safar as a consultant. Humood turns to Ilaf for help in suing the hospital.

episodes.name: Episode 66
episodes.overview: Farah is furious when she runs into Rashed and Nahla at the mall. Mishari meets with Shawq to introduce her to Nasiba. Jawaher’s friend shows up at Nahla’s café asking for a job.

episodes.name: Episode 67
episodes.overview: Nahla expresses her discomfort about Farah working with Rashed. Muna’s suspicious behaviour raises concern at the café. Muna tries to come between Mishari and Nasiba.

episodes.name: Episode 68
episodes.overview: Amal delivers a new blow to Mishari and Shawq, as Farah barges into Nahla’s, accusing her of trying to steal her children.

episodes.name: Episode 69
episodes.overview: Humood’s wife shows up at Jawaher’s doorstep. Amal provokes Shawq into a fight. Safar decides to do business behind his sister’s back.

episodes.name: Episode 70
episodes.overview: Amal’s ultrasound result is released, as Humood receives good news from Ilaf.

episodes.name: Episode 71
episodes.overview: Shawq is overwhelmed with guilt over what happened to Amal, as Nahla tries to support her. Safar gets his hands on sensitive information that could give him the upper hand.

name: Season 1
overview: A devastating car accident unearths a long-buried secret that turns wealthy businessman Rashid and hardworking Nahla's life around; fifteen years ago, their daughters were switched at birth.
